NAME: rob
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to steal another member every 12 hours.
OPTION_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user you want to try to rob.
TITLE: {{username}} just stole another member.
INVALID: You cannot rob a bot or yourself.
NOTHING_TO_ROB: This member has nothing to rob.
NEED_MIN: You must have at least 250{{currency}} in your wallet to be able to rob someone.
FAIL: You missed your theft and lost {{amount}}{{currency}}
DISABLED: The server admins disabled the robbing feature.
